title: Rapid, microwave-assisted deposition of anisotropic silver nanostructures on various substrates
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23638-23644
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03132F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
K. S. Choudhari, S. A. Shivashankar, Suresh D. Kulkarni
A facile, rapid, and scalable in situ microwave-assisted solvothermal technique (MAST) has been developed to deposit anisotropic silver nanoparticles (AgNP) on various substrates in a solution medium.
